reviews.sentence: Great getaway in La Jola. We spent 4 nights at the Travelodge and had a great experience. Room was clean and quiet staff friendly and always helpful. Easy walk to the beach and good restaurants. We would happily book a room here on a return to La Jola. Not a new or upscale property but a quiet neighborhood motel.

Another great stay. My wife and I needed a quick getaway and this has quickly become one of our favorite spots. The staff are very cordial and friendly. Lupita greeted me on check in and even remembered me and my wife even though we only stayed there once before. Check in was painless and quick. We even asked for a late check out which they gladly accommodated. The room is more than basic and has a microwave mini fridge and safe. All items were clean and well arranged and we felt instantly at ease upon entering the room. The hotel is in a quiet area of La Jola and only about 15 blocks from the beach. After check out we took a 1 minute drive to the beach and watched the surfers ride some pretty great waves. All in all it was a very relaxing one night stay. We highly recommend this location. If you are looking for 4 star acomodations definitely look elsewhere. there is plenty of 30night hotels in the area. But if you are looking for a clean friendly hotel at an affordable price stay here. we are glad we did. Tip Become a Wyndham Rewards member. you will earn points for each stay and can eventually trade them for free stays at any Wyndham property. We have yet to get enough points for a free stay but are definitely looking forward to doing so.

Affordable Comfortable Friendly Close to Beach. Friendly family atmosphere. The hotel staff were very nice and helpful. I had a package delivered via FEDEX to the front desk and the manager signed for it and made sure I received it. Nothing fancy here but for me it had everything I needed and more. The breakfast was fine and the all day coffee and oranges kept me fueled throughout the day. Very nice walk to the beach which is of course incredible. I also loved the pool and jacuzi which are open from 9 AM 10 PM. I will return.
Great value for quick getaway. Great value for an awesome location. Room feels dated but was very clean. Staff was awesome breakfast was nice bed was comfortable. Bathroom rather cramped but clean.

Best budget motel that we have stayed at. Very friendly and helpful staff clean room and property comfortable bed 2 minute walk to the beach and good on sight parking. We will stay here on future trips to San Diego.

A wonderful place to return to. We look forward to come back to this well kept hotel every winter. The manager Daniel Nesbit has created a family hotel of very good quality with a very nice staff. The location is perfect close to Windansea beach. The rooms are clean and well equipped. The pool is warm and clean. The breakfast is very good. This year we returned with our son and his family. Our grandchild seems to like the hotel too. So we all hope to come back soon.

Perfect for the beach. Friendly staff large clean rooms nice pool jacuzi excellent location minutes from the beach. We stayed in a lot of different hotels on our road trip and this was definitely the best value. I wish I could have stayed longer. For the price I can not complain about anything.
Three day getaway in La Jola. short drive to everything.

Great for a beach holiday and Pacific sunsets. It is the nearest motel to the best beach in La Jola and reasonably priced for what is quite an exclusive location. The rooms are perfectly comfortable and there is a reasonable breakfast available but also a really excellent coffee shop literally next door. Shower was a little dated and bathroom was a bit cramped.

Perfect end to a fab vacation up and down the coast from D This hotel was the last on a coastal road trip it was so affordable we were not expecting much. It was so comfortable clean with all white linens and lovely remodeled bathrooms. Also the staff are extremely helpful. Steps from the beach. amazing sunset. Help yourself breakfast was above average by a long way. Nothing. We will come back here.

Will choose again. 3 minute walk to the beach was great. Less than 10 minute drive to the best eateries in the area. Traffic was light and easy. The staff especially Nick were awesome. The pool and hot tube were a plus. Nice room size was helpful. Tight parking especially late at night. Breakfast was ok for a snack kind of bland for the family tastes but doable if you are in a hurry. Oh the bed was OK for a double bed my liked it but I not so much little too soft.

Great location. Clean. Spacious rooms. Walking distance location for beach and great restaurants. Staff was very friendly and efficient. As I was leaving I saw they had bikes available you might want to check into that. The mattress in our room was super soft the kind that sinks inwards when you sit on it. My wife and I are both in our 50s and would have preferred more support when sleeping. As a result neither of us got a decent nights sleep. Our kids on the other hand did not even notice and slept well. The reception area tv had CN on the whole time. Could find remote to change. FYI management some of us go on vacation to escape from such things.

Its great I am going there with more family to stay longer in about a week. Bed was real comfy beach like a 5 min walk like 4 different type of places to eat within walking distance staff very happy to please. They do not have a elevator for those with Maybe a disability.
